client.models.evidence 源代码

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
@File        : evidence.py
@Author      : liuda
@Time        : 2022/4/1 16:51
@Description :
"""
from django.db import models
from client.models.base import BaseModel, NameAndDescNameModel
from client.models.credit_certificate import CreditCertificate



[文档]class EvidenceType(NameAndDescNameModel):

    class Meta:
        db_table = "evidence_type"
        verbose_name = "存证类型表"




[文档]class ChainEvidence(BaseModel):
    data_type_choices = (
        ("file", "文件类型"),
        ("data", "数据类型"),
    )
    credit_certificate = models.ForeignKey(
        CreditCertificate,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        verbose_name="信用凭证ID"
    )
    tx_hash = models.CharField(
        max_length=100,
        null=True,
        verbose_name="上链哈希"
    )
    data_type = models.CharField(
        max_length=20,
        choices=data_type_choices,
        verbose_name="数据类型"
    )
    evidence_type = models.ForeignKey(
        EvidenceType,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        verbose_name="存证类型"
    )

    class Meta:
        db_table = "chain_evidence"
        verbose_name = "区块链存证表"
